## Checklist

- [ ] Excuse is 50 characters or fewer
- [ ] Excuse has been observed in the wild (not just theorized)
- [ ] Excuse does not accidentally contain self-awareness
- [ ] I have verified this excuse does not lead to a conclusion
- [ ] I understand this PR will increase the `OCCURS` clause
